name: 陳玉敏
objective:
本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。
The main features of two great sources of early western civilizations, that is (1) Greek mythology and tragedies, and (2) Hebrew Biblical tradition, will be introduced to the students in the most exciting stories about Greek heroes and heroines as well as Biblical figures and events.
